NavbarFooter.map-consent-text: Google maps kan samle inn brukerdata, for å se kart må du godta.

404.goToPage: Gå til en av disse sidene:

home.homeAboutText: Jeg er en ansvarlig, ryddig og snill gutt på år. Jeg lærer raskt og gjør mitt beste. Jeg tenker grundig igjennom ting før jeg gjør det og jeg er ganske selvstendig.
home.homeInterestsText: Jeg har interesse for datamaskiner, programmering, nettverk og gaming.
home.educationText: Planen min er å gå informasjonsteknologi og medieproduksjon på vg1, og så i vg2, informasjonsteknologi. I vg3 så blir det IT-utviklerfaget. Hvis jeg ikke er førnøyd med valget mitt så skal jeg prøve å bytte over til IT-driftsfaget. Til vg1 så valgte jeg IT-utvikler for YFF.
home.educationAmbitionsText: Mine ambisjoner i livet er å få en godt betalt jobb hvor jeg trives og kan bidra på en positiv måte. Jeg ønsker også å utvikle mine ferdigheter innenfor programmering og teknologi.
home.educationSchoolsGlemmenDuration: Jeg startet på denne skolen i 2022 og går fortsatt her.
home.educationSchoolsGlemmenReview: Denne skolen er ganske digg å gå på.
home.educationSchoolsBorgeDuration: Jeg startet på denne skolen i 2019 og slutta i 2022.
home.educationSchoolsBorgeReview: I løpet av ungdomsskolen hadde interessen min for datamaskiner økt ganske mye og jeg begynte også å få interesse for koding, i 10. klasse så hadde jeg programmering som valgfag.
home.educationSchoolsArumDuration: Jeg startet på denne skolen i 2012 og slutta i 2019.
home.educationSchoolsArumReview: Dette var den første skolen jeg gikk på, og det var i løpet av denne tiden jeg fikk interesse for datamaskiner.
home.paintDrop: I sommeren 2022 så hjalp jeg til med å male huset, jeg gjorde en god jobb.
home.vaccumDrop: Jeg støvsuger alltid rommet mitt når jeg ser det er støv, noen ganger så støvsuger jeg også huset når jeg føler for det.
home.takeOutTrashDrop: Noen ganger så kaster jeg søppla vi har ute i søppel dunken, men jeg pleier oftest bare å gjøre det når jeg har en del søppel på rommet mitt som ikke har plass inne.
home.otherJobsHomeDrop:
Jeg pleier oftest å reparere og installere ting i huset, så langt har jeg fikset dører, lamper, datamaskiner internett og mer. Jeg har også installert et vindu, røykvarsler, persienner, ovner og mer.
Jeg legger også ting ut og inn i oppvaskmaskinen og legger ved i ovnen. Jeg klarer også lage ild.
home.jobsMyRoomDrop: Inne på rommet mitt sørger jeg alltid for at det er ryddig og pent. Jeg rer opp senga, støvsuger, vasker bort støv, vanner blomster og legger klær inn i skapet.
home.hobbiesText: Hobbiene mine er innenfor Gaming, datamaskiner, programmering. Jeg starta å bli interesert i gaming og data rundt sånn 2017. Programmering kom noen få år etter. Innenfor gaming så liker jeg mer rolige spill og spill hvor du må tenke litt. De spillene jeg liker er mest er fabrikk spill.
home.gameSatisfactoryDrop: Satisfactorexy er et veldig bra spill. Jeg har over 800 timer i spillet. Kjøpt: 05.09.2020
home.gameDysonSphereProgramDrop: Dyson Sphere Program er et bra spill. Kjøpt: 22.02.2021
home.gameSpaceEngineersDrop: Space Engineers er et bra spill. Kjøpt: 02.08.2021
home.gameEuroTruckSimDrop: Euro Truck Simulator 2 er et bra spill. Kjøpt: 30.05.2022
home.gamesText: Her her er alle spillene jeg har lagd i HTML og JavaScript

NavbarFooter.map-consent-text: Google maps may collect user data, in order to view map you need to consent.

404.goToPage: Go to one of these pages:

home.homeAboutText: I am a responsible, tidy and kind boy year. I learn quickly and do my best. I think things through thoroughly before I do it and I am quite independent .
home.homeInterestsText: I have an interest in computers, programming, networking and gaming.
home.homeInterestsMoreInfo: More info on the hobby page...
home.homeCodingLanguagesHeading: Code languages I have worked with
home.educationText: My plan is to go to information technology and media production in year 1, and then in year 2, information technology. In vg3, it will be the IT developer subject. If I am not satisfied with my choice, I will try to switch to the IT operations subject. For vg1, I chose IT developer for YFF.
home.educationAmbitionsText: My ambitions in life are to get a well-paid job where I enjoy myself and can contribute in a positive way. I also want to develop my skills in programming and technology.
home.educationSchoolsGlemmenDuration: I started at this school in 2022 and still go here.
home.educationSchoolsGlemmenReview: This school is pretty cool to go to.
home.educationSchoolsGlemmenLine: vg1 line: Information technology and media production.
home.educationSchoolsBorgeDuration: I started at this school in 2019 and finished in 2022.
home.educationSchoolsBorgeReview: During secondary school my interest in computers had increased quite a bit and I also started to get interested in coding, in the 10th grade I had programming as an elective.
home.educationSchoolsArumDuration: I started at this school in 2012 and left in 2019.
home.educationSchoolsArumReview: This was the first school I attended and it was during this time that I became interested in computers.
home.paintDrop: In the summer of 2022, I helped paint the house, I did a good job.
home.vaccumDrop: I always vacuum my room when I see dust, sometimes I also vacuum the house when I feel like it.
home.takeOutTrashDrop: Sometimes I throw the rubbish we have outside into the rubbish bin, but I usually only do it when I have a lot of rubbish in my room that doesn't fit inside.
home.otherJobsHomeDrop:
I usually repair and install things in the house, so far I have fixed doors, lamps, computers, internet and more. I have also installed a window, smoke alarms, blinds, heaters and more.
 I also put things in and out of the dishwasher and put wood in the oven. I can also make fire.
home.jobsMyRoomDrop: Inside my room, I always make sure it is neat and tidy. I make the bed, vacuum, wash away dust, water flowers and put clothes in the closet.
home.hobbiesText: My hobbies are within Gaming, computers, programming. I started getting interested in gaming and computers around 2017. Programming came a few years later. Within gaming, I like more quiet games and games where you have to think a bit. The games I like the most are factory games.
home.gameSatisfactoryDrop: Satisfactorexy is a very good game. I have over 800 hours in the game. Purchased: 05/09/2020
home.gameDysonSphereProgramDrop: The Dyson Sphere Program is a good game. Purchased: 22/02/2021
home.gameSpaceEngineersDrop: Space Engineers is a good game. Purchased: 02/08/2021
home.gameEuroTruckSimDrop: Euro Truck Simulator 2 is a good game. Purchased: 30/05/2022
home.gamesText: Here are all the games I have made in HTML and JavaScript
